text: There was a poor woman who had two children, the youngest of whom went out every day to the woods to get wood. He had gone deep into the house, and a very small boy came to meet him. He approached him fearlessly and helped him to pick up the wood and carry it home. The boy told his mother, but she refused to believe him. Finally, the boy took out a rose and explained that the boy had given it to him, saying, "I'll come back when this rose is opened". The mother put the flower in water. And one morning the boy did not get out of bed, and, as his mother went to call him, she found him dead, but with a calm and happy face. And that same morning, the rose opened. ♪ Finish ♪
title: La rosa
author: Hermanos Grimm
